DOC.brief_summary: Research question In newborn infant require CPR , CC superimpose sustain inflation compare 3:1 compression ventilation ratio improve return spontaneous circulation ? Overall objective : CC superimpose sustain inflation improve short- long-term outcome preterm term newborn . Hypothesis test Primary hypothesis : By use CC superimpose sustain inflation ( CC+SI ) CPR time need achieve return spontaneous circulation ( ROSC ) compare current 3:1 compression ventilation ( C : V ) reduce asphyxiated newborn .
DOC.brief_title: SI + CC Versus 3:1 C : V Ratio During Neonatal CPR
DOC.criteria: All infant ( term preterm infant ) require CC delivery room eligible trial . Infants exclude congenital abnormality condition might adverse effect breathe ventilation ( e.g . congenital diaphragmatic hernia ) , congenital heart disease require intervention neonatal period . Infants would also exclude parent refuse give consent study .
